metadata.description: A chronological record of major events that shaped the RAPPverse

age_of_genesis.description: The birth of the RAPPverse and the emergence of the First Spark

age_of_legends.description: When the greatest warriors walked the Battle Grounds

age_of_archives.description: When the great archivists established the classification system

modern_era.name: Modern Era

major_events.title: The Genesis - Birth of RAPPverse
major_events.description: The First Spark emerged from the Void of Potential and dreamed the RAPPverse into existence. The Central Hub materialized as the nexus point where all dimensions would converge.
consequences: Creation of the five dimensions: Alpha, Beta, Gamma, Delta, and Epsilon
The establishment of the Central Hub
related_prophecies: The Return of the First Spark

major_events.title: Creation of the First Cards
major_events.description: The Primordial NPCs discovered that moments of significance could be crystallized into physical form - the first Cards. The Genesis Card, depicting the First Spark's dream, was the first ever created.
consequences: The Genesis Card sealed in the Forbidden Stacks
Cards became the currency of memory

major_events.title: Establishment of the Grand Tournament
major_events.description: The Grand Tournament was established as a way to channel competitive energy constructively. The first tournament had only 8 participants. The tradition of the Champion's Comeback was born when an ancient warrior somehow defeated an unbeatable opponent.

major_events.title: Founding of the First Merchant Guild
major_events.description: Seven master traders came together to establish order in the chaotic early marketplaces. They created the Merchant's Code - principles that all traders follow to this day.

major_events.title: The Great Silence
major_events.description: A gap of approximately 1000 ticks where almost nothing was recorded. The archivists left only cryptic fragments. The Keeper of Memory refused to record events during this period.
mysteries_remaining: What happened during the Great Silence?
Why did the Keeper of Memory refuse to record?
What is sealed in the Sleeping Archive?

major_events.title: Grand Tournament Finals 2026 Announced
major_events.description: The largest tournament in RAPPverse history was announced, with 64 competitors registering to compete for glory and a 10,000 RAPPcoin prize pool.
consequences: All NPCs prepare for the event

major_events.title: Preliminary Rounds Begin
major_events.description: The Grand Tournament preliminary rounds commenced. Dark horses emerged while favorites stumbled, setting the stage for an unpredictable championship.

major_events.title: Cipher Cap's Mysterious Strategy Unveiled
major_events.description: During the quarterfinals, Cipher Cap deployed an unprecedented mystery strategy that baffled analysts and mesmerized spectators. The strategy remains undeciphered to this day.

major_events.title: Blaze Baz's Legendary Comeback
major_events.description: In the semifinals, Blaze Baz achieved what many consider the greatest comeback in tournament history. Down to the brink of elimination, the champion rallied to defeat Nova Nex in a match that will be remembered for generations.
consequences: Legendary card minted commemorating the moment

major_events.title: Grand Tournament Finals - Blaze Defeats Cipher
major_events.description: Blaze Baz defeated Cipher Cap in an epic championship showdown witnessed by record attendance. Blaze claimed their 12th tournament victory, cementing legendary status. Cipher's cryptic acceptance of defeat sparked new mystery.
consequences: Dynasty Builder achievement awarded to Blaze

major_events.title: Victory Celebration Begins
major_events.description: A world-spanning celebration commenced following the Grand Tournament Finals. The event would span 11 ticks with 9 NPC participants across 4 zones.

major_events.title: Celebration Winding Down - First Bonds Form
major_events.description: As the celebration began to wind down, NPCs gathered in smaller, more intimate groups. The Gallery became a hub for creative and analytical minds, while the Central Hub remained a social center.
consequences: Pixel Pam and Echo Eve friendship forms

major_events.title: Late Night Reflections - Alliance Formation
major_events.description: The late night phase of the celebration saw the formation of multiple alliances. The Gallery became home to four NPCs sharing knowledge and quiet companionship. The Hub maintained its social atmosphere with champion Blaze and others.
consequences: Data-sharing alliance between Synth and Quinn
First seeds of Unlikely Alliance storyline
milestone_achievements: Pixel Pam and Echo Eve friendship milestone 50

major_events.title: Victory Celebration Concludes
major_events.description: The Victory Celebration officially ended after 11 ticks of festivities. The RAPPverse entered a period of reflection and normal operations resumed.

major_events.title: Three New NPCs Arrive
major_events.description: Three new NPCs spawned in the RAPPverse, drawn by the aftermath of the Grand Tournament and celebration.
consequences: New challenger seeks to test the champion
Dimensional explorer brings news from beyond

major_events.title: Whale Transaction - Championship Card Record
major_events.description: A major collector purchased the Blaze Championship Holographic card for 8500 RAPPcoin, setting a new all-time high for legendary cards.

major_events.title: Mythic Wanderer Fragment Purchase
major_events.description: A whale transaction of 12500 RAPPcoin for the Mythic Wanderer Fragment caused a 5.2% market surge.

major_events.title: Fifth Dimension Preview Card Sold
major_events.description: A mythic-rarity Fifth Dimension Preview card sold for 5000 RAPPcoin, setting a new all-time high for this card type.

major_events.title: Portal Key Fragment Auction
major_events.description: Cipher Cap won an auction for the legendary Portal Key Fragment for 2500 RAPPcoin. The mysterious NPC's interest in dimensional artifacts fuels speculation.

upcoming_events.title: Dimensional Portal Opens
upcoming_events.description: When all dimensions reach tick 36, a dimensional portal is expected to open, allowing NPCs to travel freely between dimensions.

upcoming_events.title: Cross-Dimension Tournament
upcoming_events.description: Champions from all dimensions gather for an exhibition match.

upcoming_events.title: Next Grand Tournament
upcoming_events.description: The next scheduled Grand Tournament, continuing the tradition.
